document_data.caption: A map of the Moonsea showing the Throat.
document_data.name: Throat
document_data.mainbody: The '''Throat''' was a small roadway found in the [[Moonsea]] region between [[Zhentil Keep]] and [[Yûlash]].
document_data.Description:
The Throat ran south from Zhentil Keep, crossing the [[River Tesh]] before turning southwest to connect with Yûlash and the [[Bowshaft Way]].

The Throat connected with Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] at the [[Throat Gate]].
